short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for Forex Corporate MT4 Traders

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Forex Corporate MT4 ChromeTrader brings full functionality, MT4 trading through a sleek, optimized interface as well as robust Forex Tools, Charting and Pricing all made accessible right from your browser and free for all new and existing Forex Corporate clients ( for more information visit the Forex Corporate website ). 

Features Include:
    - Real-time interactive currency charts
    - Real-time market price overview
    - Advanced custom indicators
    - Quad multi-chart View
    - Trading from a live tick chart
    - All available instruments
    - Placing and managing buy, sell and pending orders
    - Stop loss and take profit
    - Closing and modifying open orders
    - Viewing current result of open trades
    - Viewing detailed trading history
    - Fibonacci Retracement Calculator
    - Pivot Point Calculator
    - Profit Calculator
    - News Calendar
    - Free Demo Accounts
    - And more...

Forex Corporate is one of the leading online brokerage companies in the world,we are proud to
continuously provide the most advanced and complete trading experience to our ever-growing
international client base.At Forex Corporate we ensure that client investments and transactions
are secure and exclusively managed by top European investment firms. It is our obligation to you,
with Forex Corporate, clients funds are in separate client account via the investment firms.

Disclaimer:
Trading Forex can be extremely risky, by use and/or download of this software you acknowledge that you have fully read and understand the End User License Agreement and Risk Disclosure available on the Forex Corporate website, and that you agree to the terms set forth therein. MT4 is a product of MetaQuotes Software Corp.
